description: A creepy crunchy treat that's perfect for Halloween. These healthier fruit and cinnamon oat crackers are great for hungry little tummies.
name: Fruity Cinnamon Ghost Crackers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Kids light meal & snack,Fresh Food Kids,Kids snack

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper.
Place 2 cups oats in a food processor and process until a flour-like consistency forms.

Place banana, cinnamon, maple syrup, egg and apple in a large bowl and stir, using a wooden spoon, to combine. Stir in oat flour and remaining oats, then use your hands to bring dough together. Roll dough between 2 sheets of baking paper until 5mm thick.
Using an 8cm Halloween cutter, cut shapes from dough and place 3cm apart on trays. Re-roll scraps and repeat process to make a total of 20 crackers.
Bake for 15 minutes or until just golden on the edges. Allow to cool on trays for 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Store in an airtight container until ready to serve.
